dialogue.text: What a nice and warm place
My hamster named "EsoTilin", likes to play volleyball a lot when he comes to this place
So . . . Maybe he'll throw you a volley ball once in a while.
I don't know that hamster but I have a feeling I'm going to hate him too much...
Oh believe me, he never fails . . .
Just try not to get hit on the head with the ball by responding with the "spacebar"
Here I go hamster with aimbot!
